title: PUBG: Battlegrounds
description: PUBG: Battlegrounds is a battle royale shooter where players parachute onto an island, scavenge for gear, and fight to be the last one standing.

title: Among Us
description: Among Us is a social deduction game where crewmates complete tasks while impostors attempt to sabotage and eliminate them.

title: Celeste
description: Celeste is a precision platformer about climbing a mountain, with challenging levels and a touching story.

title: Hades
description: Hades is a roguelike dungeon-crawler where you fight your way out of the underworld using varied weapons and upgrades.

title: Hollow Knight
description: Hollow Knight is a hand-drawn Metroidvania with deep exploration, challenging combat, and a haunting world to uncover.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Stardew Valley is a relaxing farming simulator with farming, crafting, relationships, and dungeon exploration.

title: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is a run-and-gun action game with 1930s cartoon-inspired art and tough boss battles.

title: Dead Cells
description: Dead Cells is a fast-paced roguelike with dynamic combat, procedurally generated levels, and permanent upgrades.

title: Ori and the Blind Forest
description: Ori and the Blind Forest is an atmospheric platformer with beautiful visuals and emotional storytelling.

title: Hotline Miami
description: Hotline Miami is a fast, violent top-down shooter with a neon retro aesthetic and rhythmic action.

title: Terraria
description: Terraria is a 2D sandbox adventure with crafting, building, exploration and boss fights.

title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: The Binding of Isaac is a top-down roguelike with procedurally generated dungeons and strange item synergies.

title: Limbo
description: Limbo is a monochrome puzzle-platformer with eerie atmosphere and clever physics puzzles.

title: Subnautica
description: Subnautica is an underwater survival/exploration game where you gather resources, craft gear and uncover mysteries.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox building and exploration game with limitless creativity and survival challenges.
